title: RosettaAmount
description: Amount is some Value of a Currency. It is considered invalid to specify a Value without a Currency.

value.description: Value of the transaction in atomic units represented as an arbitrary-sized signed integer. For example, 1 BTC would be represented by a value of 100000000.

currency.description: Currency is composed of a canonical Symbol and Decimals. This Decimals value is used to convert an Amount.Value from atomic units (Satoshis) to standard units (Bitcoins).
